reviewText: Again, Suzanne offers clear, sincere instruction and is so patient. It's like having your own personal guide to better balance! I like that she has specific products for different needs -- so you can mix and match as you like!

Have a Ball! Suzanne Andrews has a winner for the 40+ population in this DVD showing you how to improve your balance, strength and flexibility. Great music along with standing and seated versions so anyone of any age, any size or fitness level can follow along and get results. Therapeutically designed exercises are safe, effective and fun.Functional Fitness Better Balance
